properties.value: The divine super strength potion is a stat-boosting potion that increases the player's Strength level by 5 + 15% of the player's Strength level for 5 minutes. During these 5 minutes, the player's Strength level will not drain below the maximum boost of the potion. Although natural stat drain is disabled, a player's stats can still be decreased or increased by the use of other spells and potions.

SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 24Buy limit: 2000Examine: 1 dose of divine super strength potion.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Divine super strength potionImage: File:Divine super strength potion(1).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.030Value: 40Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 25 July 2019Item ID: 23718
A player drinks a divine potion.

The divine super strength potion is a stat-boosting potion that increases the player's Strength level by 5 + 15% of the player's Strength level for 5 minutes. During these 5 minutes, the player's Strength level will not drain below the maximum boost of the potion. Although natural stat drain is disabled, a player's stats can still be decreased or increased by the use of other spells and potions.

Once the 5 minutes are over, any stats normally boosted by the potion will be reduced back to their base level; Preserve does not affect the duration of the potion. Drinking this potion will also damage the player by 10 Hitpoints.

Players are unable to cast Boost Potion Share to share the effect across a group of players.

It is created by using crystal dust on a super strength potion, requiring 70 Herblore.

Mixing a divine super strength potion yields 0.5 experience per dose.

Contents

  • 1 Strength boost by level
  • 2 Creation
  • 3 Price per dose
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)

Strength boost by level[edit | edit source]

Strength boost is calculated with: ⌊ S t r e n g t h L e v e l × 15 100 ⌋ + 5 {\displaystyle \lfloor StrengthLevel\times {\frac {15}{100}}\rfloor +5}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-6 +5 34-39 +10 67-73 +15
7-13 +6 40-46 +11 74-79 +16
14-19 +7 47-53 +12 80-86 +17
20-26 +8 54-59 +13 87-93 +18
27-33 +9 60-66 +14 94-99 +19

Date Changes
2 July 2020
(update)

The inventory icon of the divine super strength potion has been graphically updated to match the look of normal potions.
